title: Minimum clinical attributes for negative screening or control groups

PatientID.description: A unique identifier for the patient. Should match the Patient ID DICOM tag (0010,0020) and the anonymization processes.

Population.description: Categorization of the subjects in the dataset based on their status.
enum: Subject on Screening with a negative result
Subject on a Control group ONTOLOGY

DateOfImagingAcquisition.description: Date when imaging study occurred for screening or control group.

AgeYears.description: Age of the subject when the imaging study was acquired (in years, one decimal allowed).

Topography.description: Area examined with the imaging modality (organ). In negative screening and control group cases, region and laterality are not mandatory.
